items.name: Yola Jungle Explorer Maze
items.short_description: Navigate through a challenging tropical-themed maze, solving puzzles and discovering hidden treasures. Perfect for young adventurers eager to test their wits and teamwork.
items.address: Opposite Federal Secretariat, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Treasure Hunt Trails
items.short_description: Embark on an exciting scavenger hunt across various themed zones, deciphering clues to find hidden 'treasures'. Encourages problem-solving and exploration.
items.address: Along Numan Road, Doubeli, Yola South, Adamawa State

items.name: Gongola River Quest
items.short_description: A water-based adventure game where kids navigate miniature boats through a winding 'river' course, completing challenges to reach the 'ancient artifact'.
items.address: Near Gongola River Bridge, Yola North, Adamawa State

items.name: Mount Pattensen Challenge Park
items.short_description: A multi-level obstacle course designed for kids to climb, crawl, and swing their way through various fun challenges, promoting physical activity and agility.
items.address: Off Army Barracks Road, Pattensen, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Dino Discovery Park
items.short_description: Walk among life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, learn about prehistoric times, and even participate in a fossil dig simulation. An exciting educational adventure.
items.address: Opposite A.A. Rano Filling Station, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Gongola Jurassic Adventure
items.short_description: A thrill ride through a simulated prehistoric jungle, encountering roaring dinosaurs and lush ancient flora. Features interactive exhibits and a mini-museum.
items.address: Near River Benue Bank, Numan Road, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Prehistoric Safari
items.short_description: Take an open-air jeep tour through a vast park populated with static and moving dinosaur models, offering fantastic photo opportunities and educational stops.
items.address: Old Airport Road, Bachure, Yola North, Adamawa State

items.name: Pattensen Raptor Retreat
items.short_description: A specialized exhibit focusing on the agile raptor species, featuring interactive displays, a 'raptor run' obstacle course, and a unique 3D movie experience.
items.address: Adjacent to Federal Housing Estate, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Funfair Rides
items.short_description: A classic funfair with a variety of rides suitable for all ages, from gentle carousels to exciting spinning cups and a mini-Ferris wheel.
items.address: Near Yola International Airport, Airport Road, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Sunshine Spinners Park
items.short_description: Specializing in spinning rides, this park offers everything from teacup rides to dizzying twisters, ensuring laughter and excitement for all visitors.
items.address: Along Numan Road, Opposite State Polytechnic, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Joyride Junction
items.short_description: A collection of classic and modern children's rides including bumper cars, a small roller coaster, and a bouncy castle area. Perfect for younger kids.
items.address: Waziri Expressway, Wuro Hausa, Yola South, Adamawa State

items.name: River View Thrills
items.short_description: Offering exciting rides with scenic views of the Benue River, including a mini-drop tower and a swinging pirate ship. Experience adventure with a beautiful backdrop.
items.address: Adjacent to Government House, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Enchanted Forest
items.short_description: Step into a magical forest where classic fairy tale characters come to life. Explore whimsical houses, meet princesses and knights, and enjoy storytime sessions.
items.address: Off Galadima Aminu Way, Yola North, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Wonderland Tales
items.short_description: A vibrant park bringing popular children's stories to life with interactive displays, character meet-and-greets, and gentle rides themed around beloved narratives.
items.address: Near Federal Medical Centre, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Princess & Heroes Kingdom
items.short_description: A dream come true for fans of royalty and bravery! Kids can dress up, participate in royal parades, and train like a hero in this enchanting themed park.
items.address: Mubi Road, Opp. AUN, Wuro Hausa, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Gongola Storybook Gardens
items.short_description: A peaceful garden setting with sculptures and scenes from classic children's storybooks. Perfect for leisurely strolls and imaginative play amidst beautiful flora.
items.address: Close to Government House, Doubeli, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Junior Sports Complex
items.short_description: A dedicated facility with mini football pitches, basketball courts, and track areas, tailored for children's leagues and recreational play.
items.address: Adjacent to Mahmud Ribadu Square, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Kids' Olympic Zone
items.short_description: Inspire future athletes with a multi-sport arena offering mini-golf, indoor climbing walls, and a soft-play obstacle course designed for active fun.
items.address: Atikum Abubakar Way, Karewa, Yola North, Adamawa State

items.name: Future Stars Arena
items.short_description: Focuses on developing coordination and team spirit through various sports challenges, including mini-tennis, badminton, and a fun interactive laser tag arena.
items.address: Along Army Barracks Road, Opp. CBN Quarters, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Pattensen Play Pitch
items.short_description: An outdoor area equipped with small pitches for five-a-side football, netball, and a dedicated space for fun relay races and group games.
items.address: Off Numan Road, Federal Low-Cost Housing Estate, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Grand Illusion Palace
items.short_description: A spectacular theatre showcasing professional magicians and illusionists, performing dazzling tricks that will amaze and entertain children and adults alike.
items.address: Near Specialist Hospital, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Magic Academy
items.short_description: More than just a show, this academy offers interactive workshops where kids can learn basic magic tricks and perform their own mini-shows.
items.address: Behind Government House, Doubeli, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Enchanted Stage of Yola
items.short_description: A smaller, intimate venue for close-up magic, comedy magic, and storytelling with a magical twist. Features different local and visiting performers.
items.address: Along Lamido Zubairu Road, Opposite Police Headquarters, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Mystic Wonders Hall
items.short_description: A dedicated hall for grand scale illusions and mentalism shows, featuring guest magicians from across Nigeria. Prepare to be astounded by mind-bending feats.
items.address: Along Ahmadu Bello Way, Yola Town, Yola South, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Bricks & Builds Park
items.short_description: A paradise for Lego enthusiasts, featuring enormous Lego sculptures, dedicated building zones, and even a 'Miniland' depicting famous Yola landmarks in bricks.
items.address: Opposite Specialist Hospital, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Lego City
items.short_description: Explore a bustling miniature city built entirely from Lego bricks. Kids can also design and add their own creations to the evolving cityscape.
items.address: Along Numan Road, Federal Secretariat Area, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Construction Zone Adventure
items.short_description: A hands-on park where children can operate miniature diggers, cranes, and other construction vehicles in a safe, sand-filled environment. Hard hats provided!
items.address: Wuro Hausa Extension, Near NEPA Office, Yola South, Adamawa State

items.name: Imagination Block Lab
items.short_description: Not just Lego, but a variety of building blocks and materials for kids to experiment with design and engineering. Offers structured challenges and free-play zones.
items.address: Off Army Barracks Road, Opposite NTA Yola, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Kids' Discovery Center
items.short_description: A hands-on museum where children can explore science, art, and culture through interactive exhibits, workshops, and play areas. Learning through doing!
items.address: Along Justice Buba Ardo Road, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Young Minds Museum
items.short_description: Dedicated to local history, crafts, and the environment. Children can learn about Adamawa's rich heritage through engaging displays and craft activities.
items.address: Near Federal Housing Estate, Yola North, Adamawa State

items.name: Curiosity Corner Yola
items.short_description: An imaginative space encouraging free-form discovery. Features sensory play areas for toddlers, a costume corner, and a mini-theater for creative expression.
items.address: Doubeli Road, Near State Library, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Future Innovators Hub
items.short_description: A modern museum focused on technology and innovation, with coding workshops, robotics demonstrations, and virtual reality experiences for young minds.
items.address: Off Barracks Road, Opp. American University of Nigeria, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Grand Circus Tent
items.short_description: A traditional circus experience featuring acrobats, clowns, jugglers, and mesmerizing animal-free acts under a vibrant big top. Fun for the whole family!
items.address: Located at Mahmud Ribadu Square, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Puppet Playhouse
items.short_description: A charming theater presenting classic and original puppet shows, bringing stories to life with intricate marionettes and hand puppets.
items.address: Off State House Road, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Jubilee Jamboree Circus
items.short_description: An interactive circus experience where kids can try out simple circus skills like juggling, plate spinning, and balancing acts, before enjoying a lively show.
items.address: Along Bishop Crowther Road, Dougirei, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Enchanting Marionette Theatre
items.short_description: Specializing in elaborate marionette performances, this theatre brings intricate stories to life with beautifully crafted puppets and detailed sets.
items.address: Near Federal Polytechnic, Bajabure, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Yola Petting Farm & Gardens
items.short_description: A charming farm where children can interact with friendly farm animals, enjoy pony rides, and explore beautiful botanical gardens.
items.address: Along Airport Road, Opposite Yola International Airport, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Adamawa Rural Retreat
items.short_description: Experience rural life with traditional farming demonstrations, tractor rides, and seasonal fruit picking activities. Learn about local agriculture.
items.address: Outskirts of Jimeta, Along Gombe Road, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Sunshine Farm Adventures
items.short_description: A lively farm park with a corn maze (seasonal), barrel train rides, and a large playground. Offers educational programs on sustainable farming.
items.address: Behind AUN, Wuro Hausa, Yola, Adamawa State

items.name: Gongola Harvest Haven
items.short_description: A seasonal farm attraction focused on harvest festivals, pumpkin patches, and hayrides. Perfect for autumn family outings and photo opportunities.
items.address: Near Gongola River Bridge, Yola, Adamawa State
